verses.verse: Hear, <S%H8085><s%> ye <S%H1121>children,<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of a <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H7181>attend<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3948>doctrine,<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> ye <S%H408>not<s%> my <S%H8451>law.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H1961>was<s%> my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H3173>only<s%> beloved in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of my <S%H517>mother.<s%>

He <S%H3384>taught<s%> me also, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Let thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H8551>retain<s%> my <S%H1697>words:<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H2421>live.<s%>

Get <S%H7069><s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H998>understanding:<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> it <S%H408>not;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H5186>decline<s%> from the <S%H4480>words<s%> <S%H561><s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Forsake <S%H5800><s%> her <S%H408>not,<s%> and she shall <S%H8104>preserve<s%> thee: <S%H157>love<s%> her, and she shall <S%H5341>keep<s%> thee.

Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is the principal <S%H7225>thing;<s%> therefore <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom:<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H7075>getting<s%> <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
Exalt <S%H5549><s%> her, and she shall <S%H7311>promote<s%> thee: she shall bring thee to <S%H3513>honor,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thou dost <S%H2263>embrace<s%> her.
She shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to thine <S%H7218>head<s%> an <S%H3880>ornament<s%> of <S%H2580>grace:<s%> a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>glory<s%> shall she <S%H4042>deliver<s%> to thee.
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H561>sayings;<s%> and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life<s%> shall be <S%H7235>many.<s%>
I have <S%H3384>taught<s%> thee in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> I have <S%H1869>led<s%> thee in <S%H3476>right<s%> <S%H4570>paths.<s%>

When thou <S%H1980>goest,<s%> thy <S%H6806>steps<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3334>straitened;<s%> and <S%H518>when<s%> thou <S%H7323>runnest,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3782>stumble.<s%>
Take fast <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H4148>instruction;<s%> let her <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H7503>go:<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> her; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> is thy <S%H2416>life.<s%>
Enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> into the <S%H734>path<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and <S%H833>go<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> men.
Avoid <S%H6544><s%> it, <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> by it, <S%H7847>turn<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> it, and pass <S%H5674>away.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H3462>sleep<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H518>except<s%> <S%H3808><s%> they have done <S%H7489>mischief;<s%> and their <S%H8142>sleep<s%> is taken <S%H1497>away,<s%> <S%H518>unless<s%> <S%H3808><s%> they cause some to <S%H3782>fall.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H3898>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H2555>violence.<s%>

But the <S%H734>path<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> is as the <S%H5051>shining<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> that <S%H215>shineth<s%> more and <S%H1980>more<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3559>perfect<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is as <S%H653>darkness:<s%> they <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> at <S%H4100>what<s%> they <S%H3782>stumble.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7181>attend<s%> to my <S%H1697>words;<s%> <S%H5186>incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> unto my <S%H561>sayings.<s%>
Let them <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3868>depart<s%> from thine <S%H4480>eyes;<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thine <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H2416>life<s%> unto those that <S%H4672>find<s%> them, and <S%H4832>health<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
Keep <S%H5341><s%> thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> with <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4929>diligence;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> it are the <S%H8444>issues<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>
Put <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee a <S%H6143>froward<s%> <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H3891>perverse<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> put <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee.
Let thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> right <S%H5227>on,<s%> and let thine <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> look <S%H3474>straight<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> thee.
Ponder <S%H6424><s%> the <S%H4570>path<s%> of thy <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and let <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> be <S%H3559>established.<s%>
Turn <S%H5186><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left:<s%> <S%H5493>remove<s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> from <S%H4480>evil.<s%> <S%H7451><s%>
